card.name: Allies in the East and in the South
card.graphics: Allies in the East and in the South.jpg
card.text: Playable if you are Alatar, Pallando or a Dúnadan-lord, you have more then 6 P and at least 3 unique factions playable at sites in Horse Plains, Nurn, or Khand in play. Your factions playable at sites in these regions are worth full mp. Influence attempts made by your opponent against such factions are modified by -2. Cannot be duplicated.

card.name: Anborn of Ithilien
card.text: Unique. Manifestation of Anborn. Unless he is among the starting characters, he may only be brought into play at his home site. Anborn costs only 3 points of influence to control when in the company with Faramir, Damrod or Mablung. -1 to his CC if not in the company with one of these characters.

card.name: Ancient Druedain Wisdom
card.text: Lore. Playable on a Wose character with a mind of 5 or more, if you discard (for no effect) a Lost Knowledge card from the company. Bearer may tap to make non-unique hoard items playable at Ruins and Lairs [R] with a Pûkel-creature automatic-attack.

card.name: Angbor
card.text: Unique. +1 EI against Man and Dúnadan factions playable at sites in Gondor.

card.name: Banner of Elendil's House
card.text: Unique. Playable at Rivendell, if you have Arwen and Ring of Barahir in play. Discard if not borne by a Dúnadan. Each Dúnadan in bearer’s company requires 1 less influence to control (to a minimum of 1). May not be played by a Fallen-wizard player.

card.name: Beacon of Gondor
card.text: Dunadan-lord specific. Playable during the organization phase on a company using region movement that can legally move to a Free-domain [f] or Border-land [b] in Gondor. This card is used as a site card and 1 of your Lordhavens [H]; designate the region in Gondor (cards drawn: 2/2). Nothing is playable as written on the site card. If 1 of your companies is at this site, all attacks against it are canceled. Discard this card when the site is discarded or returned to its location deck. It cannot be discarded otherwise.

card.name: Beacons Alight!
card.text: All sites in Gondor receive an additional automatic-attack: Men — 3 strikes with 8 prowess (detainment against hero characters).

card.name: Black Númenóreans
card.text: Manifestation of minion Black Númenóreans. Playable at a Dúnadan-hold Port in the Sun-lands or at Gobel Mírlond, if you discard from hand or from play The White Council or The Black Council if the influence check is greater than 8. Standard Modifications: Dúnedain (+2), each Black Númenóreans you have in play (+2). Cannot be duplicated at a given site.

card.name: Blood of Númenor
card.text: Unique. Lord Denethor specific. Playable on Denethor if he has 12 or more P, 2 Dúnadan factions playable at Ports, a Palantír and 5 Dúnadan characters in play. Discard if the above mentioned requirements are not met. +1 to his body. tap: during organization phase to bring a Dúnadan character with a mind less than 3 from discard pile to your hand, or to modify an influence check made by a character in Gondor or by Denethor by +5.

card.name: Blood-stone Amulet
card.text: Jewel. May not be a starting item, unless your starting company includes a Wose character. May only be played after you successfully influence a Wose faction. +1 EI against Wose characters.tap: cancel a strike from a Pûkel-creature attack against bearer’s company.

card.name: Burned and Chopped-up
card.text: Playable by a minion company at Minas Tirith. The company faces 3 attacks: Men — 5 strikes with 9 prowess; Men — 4 strikes with10 prowess; Dúnedain — 3 strikes with 12 prowess; afterwards tap a warrior in the company or discard this card. If opponent has The White Tree and/or Sapling of the White Tree in play at Minas Tirith (stored or otherwise), it is discarded and this card is inverted; it may be stored at a Darkhaven [K] for 5 mp. Alternatively, this card may also be played at any site where either The White Tree or Mallorn is in play (all other conditions still apply). Discard the The White Tree and/or Mallorn, if this card is successfully played. Cannot be duplicated on a given site.

attr.value: Hobbits faction is playable at this site; each Hobbit at this site bearing a battle-gear item gives +1 to the influence check. When Hobbits is played at this site, any Hobbit with a home site in The Shire may be brought into play at Bywater.
(1st) Hobbits — 6 strikes with 5 prowess; * (2nd) Dúnedain — 2 strikes with 11 prowess
*If the Hobbit faction is in play at this site, then the 1st auto-matic attack receives + 1 prowess and +1 strikes and cannot be canceled.
Men — 3 strikes at 8 prowess (detainment; the attack is canceled if the company contains a character with a home site in Anórien or Ithilien).
Men — 3 strikes with 8 prowess (detainment against covert company)
Men — each character faces 1 strike with 6 prowess (detainment against covert companies).
Tap a Man or Dúnadan in a covert company to play a minor item from discard pile. This site never taps.

if you have in play at least 4 Man or Dúnadan factions playable at sites in Gondor, a Man or Dúnadan character at this site may tap to bring Profitable Trade into play from sideboard (as if the factions were of different races).

card.name: Captain of the Royal Rangers
card.text: Unique. Lord Denethor specific. Playable only on Faramir at Minas Tirith (or in your starting company). Faramir becomes a leader. +2 EI against characters with a home site in Gondor. While moving to Henneth Annûn no creatures may be keyed to the site against his company. If Faramir is at Henneth Annûn, all agent attacks against his company are canceled.

card.name: Captain of the Tower Guard
card.text: Unique. Lord Denethor specific. Playable on Boromir at Minas Tirith (or in your starting company). Boromir II becomes a leader. +2 EI against characters with a home site in Gondor. If Denethor is eliminated, all effects associated with Denethor now apply to Boromir II. Attacks against his company keyed to Anórien (by name and type) are detainment.

card.name: Captains of the West
card.text: Unique. Playable on a manifestation of Aragorn II, Boromir, Faramir or Imrahil at Minas Tirith. Your Man and Dúnadan warrior characters in the company with a mind of 2 or less do not cost influence to control. You may bring any number of these into play during organization phase at Minas Tirith, and there is no limit to your company’s size. Discard this card when there are more than 2 non-Man, non-Dúnadan characters in the company or when you move outside Gondor or Mordor. If the bearer of this card leaves active play, you may transfer this card to one of above mentioned characters in the company.

card.name: Cause of the Free Peoples
card.text: Unique. Playable on an untapped diplomat character at the same site as a revealed agent that cannot use any type of magic. Tap the character and make an influence check against the agent, modified by -1 for each revealed agents in play. If the influence check is successful, the agent is discarded. If you have a copy of the agent in your hand, you may play him as an ally worth 1 less mp (to a minimum of 1) under the control of the influencing character. Place this card with the ally.

card.name: Challenge
card.text: Playable on one of your characters during CvCC, before strikes are asigned. Choose 1 of your opponent characters: both must engage in CvCC as if they were 1 character companies.

attr.value: *only playable if you faced a Man creature this turn. An overt company must tap a scout to move to this site.
*only playable if you faced a Man creature this turn.

card.name: Councellors of the North Kingdom
card.text: Unique. Playable if 2 of the following cards arein play: Master of Buckland, The Thain or The Mayor. Bearers of these cards gain +2 EI against Dúnedain and Dúnadan factions, may use any Palantír they bear, and may tap at any time to take Arthadan Rangers or Rangers at Sarn Ford from discard pile into hand. Any Mischief in a Mean Way in play at sites in The Shire must now be discarded.

card.name: Cult of the Eye
card.text: Playble only if Doors of Night is in play. All Border-holds [B] and Free-holds [F], at which minion Man and/or Dúnadan faction(s) are in play, have an additional automatic-attack: Men — 2 strikes with 10 prowess (detainment against minion companies). Additionally, all influence attempts by a hero player against factions at these sites are modified by -2.

card.name: Damrod of Ithilien
card.text: Unique. Manifestation of Damrod. Unless he is among the starting characters, he may only be brought into play at his home site. Damrod costs only 3 points of influence to control when in the company with Faramir, Anborn or Mablung. -1 to his CC if not in the company with one of these characters.

card.name: Death of a Kinsman
card.text: Unique. Playable after an attack, if a character has been killed by the attack. tTap all other characters in the company.

card.name: Derufin
card.text: Unique. If in the same company as Duilin he requires only 2 influence to control.

card.name: Dervorin
card.text: Unique. +1 EI against Dúnedain.

card.name: Devastation
card.text: Playable on a site on which Siege or Wyrmsiege was in play at the beginning of the movement/hazard phase. Discard Siege/Wyrmsiege. Any version of the site becomes a Ruins & Lairs [R] and the region containing the site a Wilderness [w]. Replace all automatic-attacks with: Undead — 3 strikes with 7 prowess. Additionally, the site never untaps and is not discarded or returned to the location deck. Discard this card if Rebuild the Town is played on the site or the site becomes a Haven [H]

card.name: Dirwood Spear
card.text: Weapon. +1 prowess against Animals, Orcs, Undead and Wolves. Wose only: +1 EIagainst Wose.

card.name: Duilin
card.text: Unique. If in the same company as Derufin he requires only 2 influence to control.

card.name: Duinhir
card.text: Unique. +2 EI against Men of Lamedon faction. +3 EI against characters with Vale of Erech as their home site.

card.name: Dúnadan Mariner
card.text: +1 prowess when moving through a Coastal Sea region [c] or when at a Port or site in a Coastal Sea region.tap: allow his company to use Port movement. Discard Great Ship or Black Sails (for no effect) during the organization phase to allow his company to move 3 extra regions, if moving with Port movement.

attr.value: (1st) Orcs 4 — strikes with 7 prowess(2nd) Wolves — 3 strikes with 8 prowess
Were-wolf can be keyed here regardsless of other cards played. Stolen Knowledge.

card.name: Elendilmir
card.text: Unique. Jewel. Playable at Tolfalas, if you discard a Lost Knowledge card from the company; also playable at Isengard, if opponent has a manifestation of Saruman in play and you discard a Stolen Knowledge. +3 EI against Dúnedain and Men with a home site in Gondor. Dúnadan only: tap: give +2 to a CC made by a Dúnadan character in the same company.

card.name: Elessar
card.text: Unique. Leader. Manifestation of Aragorn II. +4 EI against Dúnedain and Elves. You may play Return of the King and Army of the Dead as if you were Aragorn II and take both cards from your sideboard into hand when Elessar enters play. May tap to use a palantir he bears.

card.name: End of His Labours
card.text: Unique. Playable on 1 of your non-avatar characters in active play. May not be played by a Fallen-wizard. Makea roll; add your unused GI, +2 if target character is at a Haven [H] or his home site (apply once), subtract target character’s mind, subtract total number of characters you have in active play. If the modified result is greater than character’s mind, you may place this card together with target character in your mp pile. Target character may not be brought back into active play, may not be influenced by any of your opponents, and may not be the target of any hazard effects.

card.name: Engines of Defense
card.text: Playable on a Border-hold [B] or Free-hold [F]. Cancels any attacks created by Siege. Additionally, the prowess of automatic-attacks against overt companies at this site is increased by 2. Alternatively, playable as a minion resource on a Shadow-hold [S] or Dark-hold [D]: Tower Raided cannot be played on the site and the prowess of automatic-attacks against hero companies at the site is increased by 2.

card.name: Envinyatar, the Renewer
card.text: Unique. Elessar specific. Playable during the site phase at Umbar, if Elessar is there and Raid on Umbar is inyour mp pile. Umbar becomes one of your Havens [H] and is never discarded. You may play Tarma of Ar-pharazôn at Umbar: discard any factions in play at the site. If you also have Stone of Erech in play this card is worth 5 mp and all influence attempts by opponents against factions, characters and allies in Gondor or Haradwaith are modified by -5.+1 to your handsize when Elessar is in Mordor or the Sun-lands.

card.name: Ernil-i-Pheriannath
card.text: Unique. Playable on Pippin, if To Fealty Sworn is played on him and you have Return of the King or Steward of Gondor in play. Pippin receives +1 prowess. He requires only 2 influence to control, if controlled by any manifestation of Aragorn II or the Steward of Gondor. When facing an attack you may always assign a strike to Pippin regardless of the attack’s abilities or his status.Discard if you have neither Return of the King nor Steward of Gondor in play.

card.name: Escaped Slaves
card.text: Playable at any Shadow-hold [S] or Dark-hold [D] during the same site phase you played Rescue Prisoners if the influence check is greater than 7. This card may be played at a tapped site and its play does not tap the site.

card.name: Eyes of the White Tower
card.text: Unique. Lord Denethor specific. Place this card on Denethor if he is in play. Return this card to your hand if you so choose during your organization phase. In addition to adopting the given attributes, Denethor’s skills become Sage/Diplomat. Denethor may not move. Once per turn, Denethor may make a CC instead of tapping when he uses a palantir. +1 to your hand size.

card.name: Faction en Garde
card.text: Playable on a site where a unique faction you control is in play. All automatic-attacks at this site have their streikes and prowess increased by 2. If this card is revealed on guard, the attacks are instead modified by +3 on the turn this card is revealed. This card may also be revealed at a site which contains no automatic-attack, to create an automatic-attack: same type as the faction — 3 strikes of 7 prowess (detainment if company and faction are same alignment). Discard this card if your copy of the faction is discarded.

card.name: First among Equals
card.text: Command. +1 cp for characters up to his total mind of 11and you may have 2 more on avatar leaders

card.name: First Settlers
card.text: Playable at any tapped or untapped site where you have played Rebuild the Town if the influence check is greater than 8. Standard modifications: none. Your opponent chooses this faction’s race: Dúnadan, Dwarf, Elf, Hobbit or Man. Cannot be duplicated on a given site.

card.name: Forbidden Knowledge
card.text: Imrahil specific. Sage only. Lore. Playable on a Dúnadan sage at one of your Lordhavens [H] (or in your starting company). The character may use sorcery, spirit-magic, and shadow-magic. Cannot be duplicated on a given character.

card.name: Garrison of Cair Andros
card.text: Unique. Playable at Cair Andros if the influence check is greater than 7. Standard modifications: Dúnedain (+1).

card.name: Get You Gone
card.text: Diplomat only. Tap the diplomat to cancel 1 unique non-agent hazard declared in the same chain of effects (i.e. before it resolves) and during his movement/hazard phase.

card.name: Gift of the Evenstar
card.text: Unique. Jewel. Playable on Frodo at any Haven [H] or Free-hold [F] where Arwen is present. tap: prevent Frodofrom being discarded or returned to your hand (even immediately after a roll is made). Additionally, Sail to the West may be played on Frodo, even if Círdan is not in play or not at Grey Havens (he may keep any non-ring items he bears).

card.name: Golasgil
card.text: Unique. +2 EI against the Men of Anfalas faction.

card.name: Grace of Uinen
card.text: Unique. Elessar or Prince Imrahil specific. Playable only on your avatar during site phase at Tolfalas. tap: during your organization phase to take Karma of Aldarion, Fair Sailing or Hair of Uinen from your discard pile into hand.

card.name: Great Elf-warrior
card.text: Unique. Playable on Sam Gamgee, after defeating a strike from an Orc or Spider attack while bearing Sting, Phial of Galadriel, or The One Ring. He receives +3 prowess against Orcs and Spiders.

card.name: Guild of the Venturers
card.text: Unique. Elessar or Prince Imrahil specific. Playable on a company at Pelargir or Linhir. Politics cannot be played on characters in the company. tap: take Leaguer of Pelargir from discard pile into hand. If Karma of Aldarion is in the company, invert this card during the site phase at a site in a Coastal Sea [c] region in the Northern Waste or in The Uttersouth. If inverted this card is worth 3 mp.

card.name: Halbarad of the North
card.text: Unique. Manifestation of Halbarad. +1 EI against factions playable at his home sites.

card.name: Heritage Forsaken
card.text: Playable on a Dúnadan character not moving through a Coastal Sea [c]. The character is worth -2 character mp (to a minimum of 0). During his movement/hazard phase the character may try remove this card. Make a roll, adding 3 to the roll if the character taps and 3 for each Coastal Sea [c] in the company’s site path; if the result is grater than 12, discard this card. Cannot be duplicated on a given company.

card.name: Hideous Lust and Rage
card.text: Playable on a manifestation of Gollum. +3 prowess against a strike he faces. Unless wounded by the strike, you may untap him afterwards.

card.name: Hirgon
card.text: Unique. +2 EI against Man and Dúnadan factions. If Hirgon is the only character in the company, add +2 to any of his influence attempts.

card.name: Hirluin the Fair
card.text: Unique. +1 EI against Dúnedain.

card.name: His Fury Has Betrayed Him
card.text: Playable during strike assignement on a non-avatar warrior, if the warrior is chosen to face a strike from a non-detainment creature attack with more than one strike. No strike can canceled. The warrior faces the attack as though he were a single character company. Each excess strike gives -1 body to the warrior. Cannot be duplicated on a given attack.

card.name: Hobbit Short-bow
card.text: Hobbit only. Weapon. tap: give -1 prowess/body to an Animal, Spider, Wolf, Orc or Man attack, and an extra -1 modification for each other Hobbit Short-bow tapped against the same attack. Cannot be duplicated on a Hobbit.

card.name: Hobbits Must Make Haste
card.text: Playable at the end of the movement/hazard phase on a moving company that contains only Hobbits and at least one untapped ally. Tap the ally: the company may move to an additional site this turn.

card.name: Hobbits of the Westmarch
card.text: Unique. Playable at The White Towers if Councellors of the North Kingdom is in play, and the influence check is greater than 8.Standard Modifications: Hobbits (+2), Dúnedain (+2) Red Book of West March may be stored at The White Towers for 3 mp: all versions of The White Towers become a Free-hold [F], the hero version loses its automatic-attack, replace automatic-attacks for minion versions with: Hobbits — 3 strikes with 6 prowess, Dúnedain — 2 strikes with 10 prowess.

card.name: Ingold
card.text: Unique. -1 to his CC. -1 to influence attempts against factions.

card.name: Kin to the Firstborn
card.text: Unique. Prince Imrahil specific. You may play Elf characters and/or factions with Prince Imrahil’s company and they are worth full mp to you.

card.name: Kingsfoil
card.text: Playable on Aragorn II bearing Athelas, if Ioreth is in the same company. Tap Aragorn II and discard Athelas. Remove all corruption cards from wounded characters in the company and heal all wounded characters (from wounded to untapped). Return of the King may be played from your hand or sideboard if Aragorn is in Minas Tirith.

card.name: Knight of Dor-en-Ernil
card.text: Prince Imrahil specific. Playable on a Dúnadan character at Dol Amroth (or in your starting company). Character becomes a leader and receives +2 EI. No dark enchantments can be played on the character. Cannot be duplicated on a given character.

card.name: Last Army of the West
card.text: Unique. Playable if Doors of Night is not in play. Each minion company moving through Anórien, Ithilien, or Dagorlad faces 3 attacks: Men — 5 strikes with 8 prowess; Dúnedain — 3 strikes with 10 prowess; Eagles — 2 strikes with 12 prowess. If these attacks are defeated, place this card in opponent’s mp pile. Additionally, any minion company moving through the above mentioned regions may only move 3 regions in all cases (even if with starter movement).

card.name: Leaguer of Pelargir
card.text: Unique. Dúnadan-lord specific. Playable if you control at least 6 characters and/ or factions playable in Gondor. All Man factions in play at sites in Gondor are worth full mp for all Dúnadan-lords. Dúnadan and Man creatures with an asterix (*) attack all companies of Dúnadan-lord players as detainment (unless the company is overt), if keyed to a region or site in Gondor; all such attacks against minion companies are never detainment. Additionally Dúnadan-lords receive full Mmp for Raid on Umbar, Rescue Prisoners and War Preperations. Discard this card if the minion version of Black Númenóreans comes into play.

card.name: Left on the Field
card.text: Playable after an Man, Orc, Troll, or Undead creature attack, if an item cannot be transfered after its bearer is discarded or eliminated, due to wounded status or unavailability of characters; does not count against the hazard limit. Place this card with the item, place both cards in your mp pile. Item gives 1 less mp and is considered stored. This card cannot be played on a unique ring item.

card.name: Lieutenant of the Tower of Barad-dûr
card.graphics: Lieutenant of the Tower of Baraddur.jpg
card.text: Unique. Playable on The Mouth. He can use spirit-magic and gains the sage skill. The Mouth becomes a War-lord and a Leader. He does not need to be controlled by GI and cannot be a follower. You can hold 1 more card than normal in your hand if at Barad-dûr or at Dol Guldur if The Necromancer is in play. Tap during your organization phase to move up to 5 resources or characters from your sideboard to your discard pile. Mouth of Sauron cannot be played.

attr.value: (1st) Men — each character faces a strike with 7 prowess (detainment against covert companies); (2nd) Dúnedain — 2 strikes with 10 prowess(against overt companies only).

Port. Discard a minor item from a character in the company during site phase to play a non-unique minor item on that character from sideboard (even a hoard item). If bearer is a Man or Dúnadan, he may tap and discard a major item to play a non-unique major item instead.

card.name: Lord Denethor
card.text: Unique. Leader. Manifestation of Denethor II. +4 EI against characters with Minas Tirith as a home site. +2 EI against the Tower Guard of Minas Tirith faction. May tap to use a Palantír he bears. When Lord Denethor is at Minas Tirirth he may tap to take Tower of Guard from discard pile to hand and you may keep 1 more card than normal in hand.

card.name: Lord of Gondor
card.text: Lord Denethor specific. All CC and influence checks are modified by +1 for the rest of the turn.

card.name: Lord of the Nazgûl
card.text: Playable if a manifestation of The Witch-king is in play. You may discard an event with Unleashed in its title to target and cancel any effect that would cancel an attack by a Nazgûl or Ringwraith.

card.name: Lord of the White Tower
card.text: Unique. Lord Denethor specific. tap: during end-of-turn phase to take one Use Palantír, I Know Much About You, Tower of Guard or a command card from your discard pile into hand. You may not play Sapling of the White Tree or the The White Tree.

attr.value: (1st) Men — each character faces a strike with 7 prowess (detainment against covert company). (2nd) Dúnedain — 2 strikes with 9 prowess (against overt companies only).
Burning Rick, Cot and Tree may be played at this site; if successfully played, all automatic-attacks at sites in Anórien and Lebennin receive -1 prowess.

card.name: Mablung of Ithilien
card.text: Unique. Manifestation of Mablung. Unless he is among the starting characters, he may only be brought into play at his home site. Mablung costs only 3 points of influence to control when in the company with Faramir, Anborn or Damrod. -1 to his CC if not in the company with one of these characters.

card.name: Mace of Anárion
card.text: Unique. Playable at Minas Morgul. Weapon. This item is normally considered a hero item. Discard a stored Dark Forges at a Darkhaven [K] and play Counterfeit on this item (as if a character) to “restore” it: it now becomes a minion item which may only be borne by a Ringwraith (it affects a Ringwraith). Warrior or Ringwraith only: +3 to prowess (to a maximum of 11) and -1 to strike’s body. This item is worth 3 mp to a hero player and/or if restored.

card.name: Master of Buckland
card.text: Unique. Playable on Merry at Brandy Hall or Bywater, if he bears To Fealty Sworn. Tap Merry to cancel an Awakened Plant attack. Alternatively, tap Merry to take Fear! Fire! Foes! into hand from discard pile.

card.name: Men of Lossarnach
card.text: Unique. Playable at Lossarnach if the influence check is greater than 7.Standard Modifications: Dúnedain (+1), Forlong in the company (+2). tap: take a food minor item from your discard pile into hand.

card.name: Mission to the East
card.text: Playable if you are Alatar or Pallando and you have at least 6 P. Playable on a Border-hold [B] or Shadow-hold [S] with a Man automatic-attack in any territory east of Wilderland, if you have successfully played a faction there. The site becomes a Wizardhaven [H] and loses all automatic-attacks. Nothing is considered playable as written on the site card. Cannot be duplicated on a given site.

card.name: No Enemy Dares Contest
card.text: Playable only if Gates of Morning is in play. Anórien, Belfalas, Lamedon, and Lebennin are considered one unified region and Free-domain [f] for all purposes. Hazard creatures with an asterix (*) keyed by name to any one of these regions may be played keyed to this unified region.

card.name: No Longer Allowed to Pass
card.text: Playable on a covert minion company moving to a Border-hold [B] or Free-hold [F]. Make a roll (+2 if moving to a Free-hold) and subtract the mind of highest mind character in the company that is untapped. If the result is 7 or greater, the company becomes overt. Discard this card when the company leaves the site. May also be played on-guard and revealed before any automatic-attacks are faced.

card.name: No More Would Come
card.text: Each player must make a roll during the untap phasefor each of his tapped factions: if the result is lower than 8, the faction does not untap. Cannot be duplicated. Discard when any play deck is exhausted.

card.name: Núrnen
card.text: Environment. Nurn is considered to be a Coastal Sea [c] for the purposes of playing non-unique hazards.

card.name: Oaths You Have Taken
card.text: Playable on any of your characters, allies or factions,if Stone of Erech or Tarma of Ar-Pharazon is in play; if played on a character or ally, he must be at Vale of Erech or Umbar accordingly. -5 to all influence attempts against target and +5 on any rolls to discard target or return him/it to your hand. Any such attempt and/or rolls are not modified by unused GI, mind or faction number. If an influence attempt against target is successful, place target in opponent’s mp pile along with this card; he/it is considered eliminated and cannot be removed from the mp pile. Cannot be duplicated on a given target.

card.name: Old Drûg
card.text: Playable on a unique Wose character. Character may tap to cancel a Pûkel-creature attack against his company.

card.name: On the Precious
card.text: Playable during site phase on a character bearing a ring special item. Take a manifestation of Gollum into hand from discard pile. Alternatively, if My Precious is face up and at a site in the same or an adjacent region, or the ringbearer is at one of My Precious’ home sites, he now attacks the ringbearer’s company. The ringbearer must face at least 1 strike. If still in play after the attack, My Precious is considered at this site (no site card is needed if none is available).

attr.value: Opponent may play as an automatic-attack 1 non-unique hazard creature from his hand normally keyed to Shadow-hold [S].
Port on Anduin. During the site phase a company may discard (for no effect) a Lost Knowledge card the company controls to make Palantír of Osgiliath playable at this site until the end of turn.
Opponent may play as an automatic-attack 1 non-unique hazard creature from his hand normally keyed to Shadow-hold [B].
Port on Anduin. During the site phase a company may discard (for no effect) a Stolen Knowledge card the company controls to make Palantír of Osgiliath playable at this site until the end of turn.

card.name: Politics
card.text: Playable on a character of mind 5 or greater in the company of a Lord avatar of the same race. Character cannot be controled by GI; if there is not enough EI available to control him, he must leave the avatar’s company after the next organization phase. Discard any Trusted Councellor or Thrall of the Voice played on the character, or Sworn to the Lord on the avatar. Discard this card if character is not in the company of your avatar.

card.name: Pride Increased with Despair
card.text: Playable on a non-avatar character with a combined mind and unused direct influence greater than 5. This character’s CC are modified by -1 for each ally he controls and for each resource permanent-event with a mp value played on him.Cannot be duplicated on a given character.

card.name: Prince Imrahil
card.text: Unique. Leader. Manifestation of Imrahil. +3 EI against Dúnadan characters with a home site in Lamedon or Belfalas. +2 EI against Knights of Dol Amroth. When Prince Imrahil is at Dol Amroth he may tap to take Tower of Amroth from discard pile to hand and you may keep 1 more card than normal in hand. If during opponent’s organization phase an opponent has a company without an agent at a non-Haven [H] site in Belfalas, you may look at his hand.

card.name: Putting away All Fear
card.text: Unique. Playable on a company at or moving to a site in a Dark-domain [d]. Discard all corruption cards placed on characters in the company. Make a roll for each environment hazard permanent-event or long-event in play; discard each if result is greater than 8. This card and its effects cannot be canceled.

card.name: Quarters of the Regent
card.text: Prince Imrahil specific. Playable on a Free-hold [F] where you have a unique faction in play. This site becomes a Lordhaven [H] for your companies and loses all automatic-attacks against your companies. Nothing is considered playable as written on the site card. If 1 of your companies is at this site, all attacks against it are canceled. Other Fallen-avatars may not use this site as a haven. Discard this card when the site is discarded or returned to its location deck. It cannot be discarded otherwise. Cannot be duplicated on a given site.

card.name: Quick as a Snake
card.text: Playable on an attack that chooses defending characters, after strikes are assigned; does not count against the hazard limit. Strikes from this attack cannot be canceled or made ineffectual.

card.name: Raid on Umbar
card.text: Unique. Playable if you have at least 2 factions in play at sitesin Gondor. Discard a Stolen Knowledge card from a Dúnadanduring the site phase at Umbar: the company faces 2 attacks (Men — 3 strikes with 8 prowess; Men — 2 strikes with 9 prowess; cannot be canceled). Afterwards tap a character to place Raid on Umbar in your mp pile or discard this card. Factions in play at Umbar give 1 less mp (to minimum of 1) and Pirates and Corsairs of Umbar receive -2 prowess. Discard Raid on Umbar if opponent ever has more factions in play at sites in Hyrmenfalas and its adjacent regions than you have at sites in Gondor.

card.name: Rammas Pelennor
card.text: Playable if you have a faction in play at Minas Tirith. All overt companies moving through Anórien face an attack: Men — 3 strikes with 8 prowess. All automatic-attacks against minion companies at Minas Tirith receive +1 prowess and +1 strike for each faction in play at Minas Tirith. All hero characters receive +2 prowess during CvCC at Minas Tirith. Discard if you have no factions in play at Minas Tirith, or if Smoke on the Wind or People Diminished is played on Minas Tirith. Cannot be duplicated.

card.name: Reunited Kingdom
card.text: Unique. Playable if you have Return of the King, The White Tree and Choice of Lúthien in play. Factions playable at any site in Arthedain, Cardolan, Rhudaur, Anórien, Ithilien, Belfalas, Lebennin, Anfalas or Lamedon are worth 1 less mp to your opponent and cannot be influenced with Muster or Threats.

card.name: Ring of Barahir
card.text: Unique. Ring. Playable by Elrond, Arwen or any manifestation of Aragorn at Rivendell. When you play this item, you may bring Choice of Lúthien from your sideboard or discard pile to your play deck. tap: cancel a Dragon or Drake creature attack and put the creature’s card back into opponent’s hand. Cannot be stored or stolen.

card.name: Rose Cotton
card.text: Unique. Hobbit. Playable by a Hobbit at Bywater. If controlled by Sam Gamgee, Rose Cotton is 2 mp. tap: prevent any effect that would either discard her controlling character or return him to your hand. tap: if controlled by Sam Gamgee to search your playdeck or discard pile for any card that mentions Sam Gamgee in its card text and take it to your hand. Discard Rose Cotton if her company leaves The Shire.

card.name: Royal Navy
card.text: Unique. Playable at Pelargir if the influence check is greater than 10. Standard modifications: Dúnedain (+1), Steward of Gondor Dúnadan (+2), Return of the King Aragorn (+3). tap: allow 1 of your companies to move an additional Coastal Sea [c].tap: cancel an attack by Corsairs of Umbar against 1 of your companies.

card.name: Rumours of Danger
card.text: tTap a scout and name a creature type: creatures of this type played against his company count as 2 against the hazard limit. Any player may discard 2 hazard creatures of this type at any time to force the discard of this card.

card.name: Rush along Recklessly
card.text: Playable on a company at the end of the organization phase on a moving company. The company’s site path may include up to 2 extra regions. The hazard limit for this company is increased by 1 for every non-ranger character in the company.

attr.value: (1st) Trap — 1 strike with 6 prowess —weapons do not modify—*(2nd) Pûkel-creature — 1 strike with 8 prowess —cannot be cancelled—
*The second automatic-attack must only be faced if the company intends to play a gold ring.
(1st) Trap — 1 strike with 6 prowess —weapons do not modify— *(2nd) Pûkel-creature — 1 strike with 8 prowess —cannot be cancelled—
The second automatic-attack must only be faced if the company intends to play a gold ring.

card.name: Sharp Blade
card.text: Playable on a character bearing a major, greater or special item weapon facing a strike from a non-Nazgûl, non-Undead attack. The body of the strike is modified by -2. Cannot be duplicated on a given strike.

card.name: Siege of Gondor
card.text: Unique. Playable if Doors of Night is in play. Any hero company moving through Anórien, Ithilien, Imlad Morgul and/or Gorgoroth must face the following attacks: Men — 4 strikes with 7 prowess; Orcs — 4 strikes with 9 prowess; Trolls — 2 strikes with 10 prowess; Animal — 1 strike with 11 prowess. The company may attempt to cancel each attack by making a roll, adding 1 for each scout in the company.If the result is greater than 8, the attack is canceled. If all four attacks are defeated, opponent gains 3 kill mp. Additionally, Anórien is considered a Shadow-land [s] for the purposes of playing hazards other than Undead.

card.name: Son of Ecthelion
card.text: Lord Denethor specific. All CC and influence checks are modified by +1 for the rest of the turn.

card.name: Spirit of Mordor
card.text: Playable on a non-unique detainment attack by Orcs, Trolls, Undeads, or Men without an asterix (*) (including an agent attack). The attack proceeds as if it were a non- detainment attack.

card.name: Star of Gobha
card.text: Unique. Jewel. Playable at Setmaenen, if the company has moved this turn with special movement from Dunharrow. +3 EI against Woses. Discard Stone of Erech if in play. If at a site in Lamedon, designate a faction in Gondor in play by your opponent and place this item with the faction. When influencing this faction the number required is 0. After a successful influence attempt, place the faction and this item in your mp pile instead of discarding it; it is considered eliminated and cannot be influenced or discarded again; your opponent’s handsize is modified by -1.

card.name: Steward of Gondor
card.text: Unique. Playable on Denethor II, Boromir II or Faramir, if Return of the King or Elessar is not in play. This card must always be transferred to the first character in line in active play, according to the above mentioned order (or discarded if he is in play by opponent).+1 to prowess (to a maximum of 6), +1 body (to a maximum of 8), +2 mind, +2 EI against Dúnedain. According to bearer: Denethor II gains the ability to use a Palantír; Boromir II gains the ranger skill; Faramir gains the sage skill. Discard this card if bearer is ever at a site outside of Gondor.

card.name: Stone Mace
card.text: Weapon. Two-handed. May not be a starting item, unless played on a Wose character.+1 prowess (to a maximum of 8)Wose only: +1 prowess against Dwarves, Orcs and Trolls.

card.name: Stories of the Elder Days
card.text: Playable on your Elf-lord, Dúnadan-lord or Wizard. Tap your avatar to take Gift of Comprehension, Lore of the Ages or Tales of the Hunt from your discard pile to hand. These may be played on characters in your avatar’s company regardless of their race and give 1 less CP. Cannot be duplicated by a given player.

card.name: Swan of Amroth
card.text: Unique. Prince Imrahil specific. Place this card on Prince Imrahil if he is in play. tap: if on Prince Imrahil during your end-of-turn phase to take Great Ship, Withdrawn to Mordor, Tower of Amroth or a command card from your discard pile into hand.

card.name: Taint of Ambition
card.text: Corruption. Playable on a non-avatar diplomat. Target character receives 1 CP and makes a CC when a resource card requiring diplomat skill is played on a character in the company. During the organization phase, if at a Haven [H] (or a site that acts as a Haven for the purpose of healing), the character may tap to attempt to remove this card by making a roll; if the result is greater than 7, discard this card. Cannot be duplicated on a given character.

card.name: Taint of Deep Lore
card.text: Corruption. Playable on a non-avatar sage. Target character receives 1 CP and makes a CC when a resource card requiring the sage skill is played on a character in the company. During the organization phase, if at a Haven [H] (or a site that acts as a Haven for the purpose of healing), the character may tap to attempt to remove this card by making a roll; if the result is greater than 7, discard this card. Cannot be duplicated on a given character.

card.name: Taint of Glory
card.text: Corruption. Playable on a non-avatar warrior. Target character receives 1 CP and makes a CC when a resource card requiring the warrior skill is played on character in the company. During the organization phase, if at a Haven [H] (or a site that acts as a Haven for the purpose of healing), the character may tap to attempt to remove this card by making a roll; if the result is greater than 7, discard this card. Cannot be duplicated on a given character.

attr.value: Contains a hoard. A scout at this site may tap, to force the discard of any creature playable Coastal Sea [c] or non-unique Dunadan creature from opponent's hand (he must reveal his hand if none are available.

Contains a hoard. *A Dúnadan sage must tap at this site to make Information playable. A scout at this site may tap to force the discard of any creature playable at Coastal Seas [C]] ] c] from opponent's hand (he must reveal his hand if none are available.

card.name: The Black Captain
card.text: Unique. Playable if a manifestation of Witch-king of Angmar and Doors of Night are in play. All Nazgûl may be played keyed to Imlad Morgul, Ithilien and Anórien and to sites in these regions (except Henneth Annûn). Witch-king of Angmar may attack from his permanent-event state, counting as one against the hazard limit. If he is not defeated after such an attack, he is returned to his player’s hand. All Nazgûl attacks keyed to the above regions or sites receive +2 prowess. Discard this card at the end of any turn if Doors of Night and a manifestation of the Witch-king of Angmar are not in active play or at a site in the above regions.

card.name: The Dwimorberg
card.text: Shadow-magic. Playable during the organization phase on a shadow-magic user at Dunharrow. The company must move with special movement to a site in Lamedon this turn: only Undead and hazard creatures keyed to the site may be played on the company, but any Undead creatures may be played. Tap all allies controlled by characters with a mind less than 6; discard any allies without body. At the beginning of the movement/hazard phase it faces 2 attacks: Undead — each character faces 1 strike with 9 prowess. Undead — 2 strikes with 12 prowess. Each character wounded is eliminated. Each Undead attack may be canceled by discarding a shadow-magic card from hand. Unless he is a Ringwraith, your shadow-magic user makes a CC at -4.

card.name: The Fief of Harnendor
card.text: Dúnadan-lord specific. Playable if you have a faction in play at a site in Haradwaith. As long as you have more factions in play at sites in Haradwaith, Harondor becomes a Border-land [b] and this card is worth 1 mp for each such faction. Discard this card if opponent has more factions in play in Haradwaith or you have no such faction in play.

card.name: The Great Battle of Our Time
card.graphics: The Great Battle of Our Time.jpg
card.text: Each player may remove any number of characters fromhis discard pile and shuffle them into his play deck. A Fallen-wizard player may remove any number of non-unique stage cards without mp value instead from his discard pile and shuffle them into his play deck.

card.name: The Mayor
card.text: Unique. Playable on Sam Gamgee at Bag End or Michel Delving, if he bears To Fealty Sworn and if Will Whitfoot is not in play. Tap Sam Gamgee to cancel the effects of a hazard event played on a Hobbit in his company. Alternatively, tap Sam Gamgee to take Wit or The Riddle Game into hand from discard pile.

card.name: The Muster of Gondor
card.text: All detainment attacks keyed by name to Rohan, Anórien, Lebennin or Belfalas, or at sites in these regions, receive +2 prowess and cannot be canceled. Additionally, Lost in Free-domains cannot be played against hero companies moving through these regions. Discard when any play deck is exhausted. Cannot be duplicated.

card.name: The Rebellion of Gondor
card.text: Prince Imrahil specific. Playable on Prince Imrahil if he has at least: 12 P, 2 protected Lordhavens [H], 4 factions and The Fief of Harondor in play. Discard if playability requirements are not met.tap: once per turn during the organization phase to take Man character with a home site in Gondor from your discard pile into hand, or to modify an influence check by Prince Imrahil either in Lamedon or Belfalas by +5. Cannot be duplicated.

card.name: The Ring Goes to Gondor
card.text: Unique. Playable if you have Steward of Gondor in play, and a manifestation of Boromir II, Denethor II, Faramir or Aragorn II bears The One Ring while at a site in Gondor. Return of the King may not be played, unless Aragorn II bears The One Ring. All Man and Dúnadan attacks against minion companies in Gondor receive +1 prowess and +1 strike. Every site in Gondor at which a Man or Dúnadan hero faction is in play becomes a Free-hold [F]; the region which contains such a site becomes a Free-domain [f]. Discard this card if the conditions to play this card are not met.

card.name: The Seaward Tower
card.text: Unique. Playable on Dol Amroth, if you discard (for no effect) a Lost Knowledge card from the company. If you have a company at Dol Amroth, at the beginning of the movement/hazard phase opponent must reveal any creature card playable on a hero company moving to or at sites in Anfalas, Belfalas or Bay of Belfalas. Only revealed creatures may be played on such companies this turn. Additionally, you may tap a faction you have in play at sites in these regions to cancel such a creature attack.Discard this card if Dol Amroth leaves active play.

card.name: The Shirriffs
card.text: Hobbits. 6 strikes. May be played keyed to the Shire. May be played as an automatic attack at any site in the Shire. Detainment against hero companies.

card.name: The Thain
card.text: Unique. Playable on Pippin at Tuckburrow or Sackville, if he bears To Featly Sworn. Tap Pippin to cancel the effect of Pilfer Anything Unwatched before it resolves. Alternatively, tap Pippin at any time to take The Shirriffs into hand from discard pile.

card.name: The Wind Is Turning
card.text: Environment. Discard 1 hazard environment long-event or permanent-event. Alternatively, make a roll: if result is greater than 5, discard any 1 hazard permanent event not played on a character or company. Cannot be duplicated on a given turn.

card.name: This We Will Take
card.text: Playable on a characters during CvCC, if you have you a non-ring item (or manifestation there of) in hand, which a character in opponent’s company bears. Each character makes a roll (+2 if character is an avatar) and adds the number of characters in his company. If your result exceeds your opponent’s, you may immidiately play the item; opponent must discard his version.

card.name: Thorongil
card.text: Unique. Agent. Manifestation of Aragorn II. Agent only: +2 prowess against Ringwraiths. May move to a Darkhaven [K]. May take 2 agent actions each turn. tap: for an extra strike. tap: attack a company moving to his site during the movement/hazard phase.

card.name: Too Much to Ask
card.text: Playable on a non-unique ally. Wound the ally (no body check required) or discard the ally if he is already wounded.

card.name: Tower of Amroth
card.text: Unique. Prince Imrahil specific. Playable on Dol Amroth. The site becomes a protected Lord-haven [H]. If one of your companies is at this site, all attacks against it are canceled. Characters with Dol Amroth as their home site may be brought into play under GI at this site even if Prince Imrahil is in play and not here. This card may be played with a starting company in lieu of a minor item. Discard this card when the site leaves active play or if Smoke on the Wind or People Diminished is successfully played on/at the site.

card.name: Tower of Ecthelion
card.text: Unique. Playable on Minas Tirith, if you have Return of the King or Steward of Gondor in play. tap: untap Minas Tirith. This card does not untap normally, instead you may tap a character with mind 6 or greater at Minas Tirith to untap it. Character makes a CC. You receive this card’s mp if you have Tower Guard of Minas Tirith and The White Tree in play. Discard this card if Minas Tirith leaves active play, or if Smoke on the Wind is played on the site.

card.name: Tower of Guard
card.text: Unique. Lord Denethor specific. Playable on Minas Tirith. The site becomes a protected Lord-haven [H]. If one of yourcompanies is at this site, all attacks against it are canceled. You may bring any number of characters with Minas Tirith as a home site into play if Denethor is there. Agents who normally do not have Minas Tirith as a home site may not move to Minas Tirith. This card may be played with a starting company in lieu of a minor item. Discard this card when the site leaves active play or if Smoke on the Wind or People Diminished is successfully played on/at the site.

card.name: Town Guard
card.text: Playable on a covert company at or moving to a Free-hold [F] or Border-hold [B], if a non-animal, non-Ent faction of the same alignment is in play at the site. Cancel an attack keyed to the site or give the attack -3 prowess (your choice). May also be played during opponent’s site phase to cancel CvCC, if the same conditions are met.

card.name: Venomous Sting
card.text: Playable on a character wounded by an attack by Spiders, Bees or Morgai Flies this turn. Disease. Attacker may now choose: target character receives -1 bodytarget character receives -1 prowesstarget character’s company may move 1 less region.Discard this card when the character is healed. If played on an Elf, discard this card at the end of the next movement/hazard phase.

card.name: War Preparations
card.text: Stolen Knowledge. Scout only. Playable at any tapped or untapped Shadow-hold [S] or Dark-hold [D] in Mordor, after facing all automatic-attack(s). Tap a scout (but not the site) to place this card on him. Can be stored at a Haven [H] for 2 mp. You may discard a stored War Preparations to take 1 faction playable at a site in Gondor from your discard pile or sideboard to your hand. Cannot be duplicated at a given site.

card.name: Watchers at the Gate
card.text: Playable on a Shadow-hold [S] or Dark-hold [D]. The site gains an additional automatic- attack: Pûkel-creature — 2 strikes with 9 prowess. Cannot be duplicated on a given site. Discard if the attack is defeated or when the site leaves active play.

card.name: Weary of War
card.text: Every non-Ringwraith character in a company that has initiated CvCC must make a CC at -2 during the end-of-turn phase.

card.name: When a Man Loves a Woman
card.graphics: When a Man Loves a Woman.jpg
card.text: Playable on a company containing either: Arwen and Aragorn II, Galadriel and Celeborn, or Eowyn and Faramir. Each of them gains +2 EI useable only against the other. If they are in the same company, all influence attempts against them fail. +1 to each of their CC. If one of them leaves play but is not eliminated, you may wound the other at any time (no body check required) to return the missing one to your hand (reshuffle play deck if it was searched).

card.name: Wizard's Pupil
card.text: Unique. Playable on Faramir, if in company with Gandalf or if you discard (for no effect) a Lost Knowledge card from hand or the company. Faramir gains the sage skill. +2 EI against non- warrior Dúnedain. +2 to his CC when bearing a ring item.

card.name: Wose Ambush
card.text: Wose. Each character in the company faces a strike. +3 prowess against Orcs. May be played keyed to any Wose-hold. May also be played keyed to Andrast, Lamedon, Old Pûkel Gap or any region containing a Wose-hold, and to Border-holds [B], Ruins & Lairs [R] and Shadow-holds [S] in these regions. Any body check resulting from the attack is modified by +2. May not be played if opponent has a Wose faction in play or a Wose character in the company. Cannot be duplicated on a given movement/hazard phase.

card.name: Wose Blowpipe
card.text: Wose warrior only. tap: consider a successful non-detainment strike from a non-Nazgûl/ Ringwraith, non-Undead attack against a character in the company defeated (all effects of the successful strike still apply). Make a roll to determine if the strike’s body is also defeated; if the strike has no body value, the roll must be higher than 4.

card.name: Wose Burial Site
card.text: Playable at the end of the organization phase on a company containing a Wose using region movement with the last one being a non-Coastal Sea [c] region containing a Wose-hold (or an adjacent region). This card is used as a site card: Ruins & Lairs [R] (automatic-attack: Pûkel-creature — 1 strike with 7 prowess. Playable: Items (minor), card draw: 1/1.) A ranger at this site may tap to play Healing Herbs from your hand, discard pile or sideboard even if the site is tapped. The hazard limit is reduced by 2 to a minimum of 2 for a company moving to this site. The company may only leave the site using region movement. Discard Wose Burial when the company moves to a new site.

card.name: Wose Elite Hunter
card.text: +3 prowess against Orcs. May only be revealed as a starting character if the company already includes a Wose character with a higher mind. tap to allow his company to move with region movement as if two non-Shadow-land [s], non-Dark-domain [d] regions seprated by a mountain range were adjacent (at least 1 region must contain a Wose-hold).

card.name: Wose Shamanist Potion
card.text: Playable only on a company containing a Wose character, or after successful play of a Wose faction or rune item. Discard this item to defeat all strikes against bearer keyed to Wilderness [w] or Ruins & Lairs [R] for the rest of the turn. Bearer makes a body check modified by -1 (wound if he fails, eliminate if already wounded).

card.name: You've Come Back Changed
card.text: Playable during the organisation phase on a Hobbit at Bree. Tap the Hobbit during the site phase at a Shadow-hold [S] or Dark-hold [D] to tap this card. This card remains tapped until the Hobbit taps during the site phase at Bree to invert this card. Once inverted you receive 2 mp and the Hobbit receives +1 prowess (+3 against Men or agents). Cannot be duplicated on a given Hobbit.
